name: Ayman Elslamony
aboutDescription: Senior Flutter Developer with over 4 years of experience specializing in architecting scalable, high-performance mobile applications. Proven track record of delivering 18+ applications across e-commerce, healthcare, and service domains. My expertise lies in leading development initiatives, transforming complex business requirements into robust technical solutions, and mentoring engineers to elevate team-wide code quality.

experiences.description:
- Mentored 2 junior developers, improving team-wide code quality and best practices.
- Led the initiative to establish new coding standards and conduct rigorous code reviews, cutting post-release bugs by 30%.
- Architected and implemented CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions), accelerating development and release cycles by 15%.
- Engineered a points-based customer loyalty system to drive user retention.

- Refactored a legacy codebase using Clean Architecture, significantly improving maintainability.
- Engineered and delivered a key geo-fenced student attendance feature.
- Successfully delivered 2 production-ready iOS applications under a tight deadline.

- Developed and launched over 8 of the company's 11+ mobile applications.
- Translated complex Figma prototypes into pixel-perfect, responsive, and high-performance UIs.
- Collaborated with backend teams to design and integrate critical RESTful APIs.

- Managed end-to-end development for 6+ client apps with 95% on-time delivery.
- Architected apps from scratch using modern state management (Bloc/Provider).

projects.name: Educational Management Apps
projects.description: A comprehensive platform for school administration, academics, and parent-teacher communication.

projects.name: Awon (Flutter Application)
projects.description:
An e-commerce app for booking hourly domestic services. 
Key Achievement: Architected a complex booking engine with multi-tier services (hourly/packages) & HyperPay/Tabby integration.

projects.name: Rafah (Flutter Application)
projects.description: A full-featured application for booking and scheduling recurring household services like cleaning and laundry.

projects.name: HyperPay (Flutter Plugin)
projects.description:
An open-source plugin for the Flutter community. 
Key Achievement: Published on Pub.dev by bridging native iOS/Android HyperPay SDKs to simplify payment integration.

projects.name: Sraco (Flutter Application)
projects.description: A targeted e-commerce platform for booking specialized cleaning professionals for corporate and residential clients.

projects.name: REFD (Flutter Application)
projects.description: A comprehensive household services platform offering cleaning, cooking, and elderly care via flexible package-based bookings.

projects.name: Handaza (Flutter Application)
projects.description: An AI-powered content delivery platform providing tailored engineering resources and materials.

projects.name: Driver Package (Reusable Solution)
projects.description:
A reusable core package for driver apps. 
Key Achievement: Engineered to slash new project development time and provide a real-time admin panel for fleet tracking.

projects.name: Tadbeer (Flutter Application)
projects.description: A dedicated e-commerce application for booking household cleaning services and professionals.

projects.name: Enaya (Flutter Application)
projects.description: A specialized e-commerce app focused on booking cleaning professionals for residential clients.

projects.name: Tanmya (Flutter Application)
projects.description: An e-commerce platform specializing in booking baby care and home maintenance services.

projects.name: Eau de Milano (E-commerce UI)
projects.description: A clean, functional e-commerce store template enabling users to browse products and manage a shopping cart.

projects.name: Coach Station (Fitness App Concept)

projects.name: Es3fni (Healthcare App)
projects.description: An on-demand healthcare platform for coordinating and scheduling home-care services like nursing and physiotherapy.

projects.name: Health Book (Healthcare App)
projects.description: A secure Personal Health Record (PHR) app enabling patients to manage medical data and conduct video consultations.
